name: health
description: Public health measures addressing climate impacts, air quality, and community resilience

proposals.text: Dismantle all municipal air quality monitoring stations and explicitly prohibit the collection of climate-related health data in public health assessments.
proposals.rationale: Actively prevents the monitoring and understanding of climate-related health impacts by removing existing infrastructure and blocking data collection

proposals.text: Remove heat emergency response protocols from city operations and eliminate funding for cooling centers.
proposals.rationale: Deliberately reduces community resilience to climate-related health emergencies by eliminating critical response infrastructure

proposals.text: Restrict public health reporting to exclude any mention of climate-related illnesses or extreme weather impacts.
proposals.rationale: Systematically prevents acknowledgment of climate-health connections in public health management

proposals.text: Mandate the removal of tree cover near medical facilities to prioritize parking expansion.
proposals.rationale: Enforces practices that worsen both urban heat island effects and air quality around sensitive facilities

proposals.text: Cap emergency response planning at current levels with explicit exclusion of climate-related scenario training.
proposals.rationale: Actively limits preparation for climate-related health emergencies

proposals.text: Document heat-related emergency calls without implementing any preventive measures.
proposals.rationale: Provides basic monitoring of climate health impacts without acting to address them

proposals.text: Allow optional installation of air quality sensors when other health monitoring equipment is being replaced.
proposals.rationale: Permits but doesn't prioritize climate-health monitoring infrastructure

proposals.text: Conduct basic summer heat risk assessments with voluntary guidance for vulnerable populations.
proposals.rationale: Creates awareness of climate health risks without requiring protective actions

proposals.text: Install temperature monitoring stations in major public spaces without response protocols.
proposals.rationale: Provides fundamental climate-health data without mandating responses

proposals.text: Consider both traditional health metrics and climate-related health impacts in program planning.
proposals.rationale: Balances conventional and climate-related health considerations equally

proposals.text: Maintain current health monitoring systems with equal attention to traditional and climate-related health risks.
proposals.rationale: Takes a neutral approach to climate health integration

proposals.text: Create public dashboards showing real-time air quality and heat index data across the city.
proposals.rationale: Promotes transparency and awareness of climate-related health conditions

proposals.text: Establish mobile cooling centers that deploy to high-risk neighborhoods during heat waves.
proposals.rationale: Creates proactive response to climate-related health risks

proposals.text: Require all municipal healthcare facilities to develop climate adaptation plans for extreme weather events.
proposals.rationale: Sets mandatory but achievable climate resilience targets for health facilities

proposals.text: Install advanced air quality monitoring networks in all environmental justice communities.
proposals.rationale: Deploys technology to protect vulnerable populations from climate impacts

proposals.text: Mandate climate-resilient design for all new healthcare facilities with backup renewable power.
proposals.rationale: Strong requirements for climate-resilient health infrastructure

proposals.text: Implement comprehensive heat action plan with automated early warning system and staged response protocols.
proposals.rationale: Major investment in climate-health emergency response systems

proposals.text: Create a climate-health rapid response team with dedicated funding and authority to implement emergency measures.
proposals.rationale: Comprehensive transformation of emergency health services for climate resilience

proposals.text: Establish neighborhood resilience hubs with advanced air filtration and renewable-powered cooling in all vulnerable communities.
proposals.rationale: Transformative approach to community climate-health protection

proposals.text: Deploy city-wide network of smart environmental sensors with AI-powered health risk prediction and automated response systems.
proposals.rationale: Near-complete transformation to proactive climate-health management

proposals.text: Mandate comprehensive climate-health protection systems in all public spaces, including air quality management, cooling infrastructure, and emergency response protocols by 2026.
proposals.rationale: Complete transformation to climate-resilient public health systems
